byline.contributor: Jason Grant contributed reporting from Newark.

abstract: Victims' attorneys report that at least 40 former students from St George's School in Rhode Island say they were sexually abused, and in some cases raped, by seven former staff members and four students at the prep school over 30 years.
lead_paragraph: The scope of the scandal at St. George’s School in Rhode Island has expanded, with reports covering three decades.

headline.main: 40 Alumni Assert Sexual Abuse at a Rhode Island Prep School
headline.print_headline: 40 Former Students Assert Sexual Abuse at a Rhode Island Prep School

snippet: The scope of the scandal at St. George’s School in Rhode Island has expanded, with reports covering three decades.
